description: Lead the design and implementation of highly available, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure solutions for enterprise customers on the AWS platform. This role requires deep expertise in networking, security, and cloud architecture best practices.
responsibilities: Lead infrastructure design for large-scale enterprise clients.
Mentor junior architects and engineers.
Define and document cloud strategy and best practices.
Automate infrastructure provisioning and deployments using IaC.
Ensure all solutions adhere to strict security and compliance standards.
qualities_wanted: Leadership
Proven experience in guiding technical teams and projects.
Problem-Solving
Ability to tackle complex architectural challenges and find elegant solutions.
Communication
Can articulate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
onboarding_location: AWS Headquarters, Day 1 Tower, Seattle, WA

description: Contribute to cutting-edge research in generative artificial intelligence and machine learning. Develop novel algorithms and models, publish findings, and collaborate with product teams to transition research prototypes into scalable products for the Azure AI suite.
required_skills: PhD in CS/AI or equivalent research experience
responsibilities: Develop and test novel machine learning models.
Publish research at top-tier conferences (e.g., NeurIPS, ICML, CVPR).
Collaborate with product teams to integrate research into Azure AI products.
Mentor research interns and junior scientists.
qualities_wanted: Innovation
A strong track record of creative research and novel ideas.
Collaboration
Works effectively in a team environment with engineers and other researchers.
onboarding_location: Microsoft Campus, Building 92 Conference Center, Redmond, WA

description: Design, develop, and maintain high-quality, performant applications for the iOS platform. Work closely with product managers and designers to deliver exceptional user experiences for millions of users worldwide.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain flagship iOS applications.
Write clean, maintainable, and testable code.
Collaborate closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI/UX.
Optimize application performance and battery life.
Participate in code reviews and mentor junior developers.
qualities_wanted: Attention to Detail
Dedication to creating pixel-perfect, polished user experiences.
User-Centric
A deep passion for building products that users love.
onboarding_location: Apple Park Main Campus, Cupertino, CA

description: Drive the go-to-market strategy for new virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) hardware devices. You will be responsible for market sizing, competitive analysis, messaging, and working cross-functionally to ensure a successful product launch.
responsibilities: Define product positioning, messaging, and value proposition.
Lead cross-functional launch teams (product, sales, PR, engineering).
Conduct in-depth competitive analysis and market research.
Develop marketing collateral, sales enablement materials, and launch assets.
Track and analyze key performance metrics post-launch.
qualities_wanted: Strategic Thinking
Ability to see the big picture and define a clear GTM strategy in a new market.
Adaptability
Thrives in a fast-paced, ambiguous, and rapidly evolving market environment.
onboarding_location: Meta Headquarters, Building 20 (MPK 20), Menlo Park, CA

description: Ensure the highest levels of reliability, performance, and scalability for Google's core services. Implement automation, manage large-scale infrastructure, and improve the entire software development lifecycle from design to operation.
responsibilities: Manage and monitor production systems and services.
Automate infrastructure, operations, and deployment pipelines.
Define Service Level Objectives (SLOs) and Service Level Indicators (SLIs).
Participate in a global on-call rotation to respond to incidents.
Conduct post-mortems and drive preventative measures.
qualities_wanted: Resilience
Handles pressure well and remains calm during production incidents.
Automation Mindset
Possesses a strong desire to automate everything and eliminate toil.
onboarding_location: Google Zurich Campus, Brandschenkestrasse 110, Zurich, Switzerland

description: Join the IBM Quantum team to develop novel quantum algorithms, contribute to the Qiskit open-source framework, and advance the state-of-the-art in quantum computation and hardware integration.
responsibilities: Design, implement, and test novel quantum algorithms.
Contribute to the Qiskit open-source framework.
Publish research findings in high-impact journals and conferences.
Collaborate with hardware teams to test algorithms on new quantum devices.
qualities_wanted: Pioneering
A genuine desire to explore and define a new frontier of computing.
Analytical
Strong theoretical and experimental skills to validate results.
onboarding_location: IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center, Yorktown Heights, NY

description: Design, implement, and maintain complex enterprise applications using Oracle Fusion Middleware technologies (e.g., WebLogic, SOA Suite). Focus on performance tuning and cloud integration strategies.
responsibilities: Develop and support complex SOA composite applications.
Performance tune WebLogic servers and database connections.
Design and implement integration solutions between on-premise and cloud applications.
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers.
qualities_wanted: Expertise
Deep, demonstrable knowledge of the Oracle middleware stack.
Reliability
A track record of building and maintaining robust, mission-critical enterprise integrations.
onboarding_location: Oracle HQ Campus, Building 500 Conference Hall, Redwood Shores, CA

job_title: Deep Learning Software Engineer - Autonomous Vehicles
description: Develop and optimize deep learning models and software pipelines for autonomous driving platforms. Optimize code for deployment on NVIDIA GPUs, ensuring low-latency and high-throughput operation.
responsibilities: Optimize deep learning models (perception, prediction) for NVIDIA GPUs.
Develop high-performance software for autonomous driving platforms.
Implement and test real-time sensor fusion algorithms.
Profile, debug, and optimize complex software systems for latency and throughput.
qualities_wanted: Performance-Oriented
An obsession with low-level optimization and wringing out every bit of performance.
Innovative
Applies cutting-edge research to solve challenging real-world autonomous driving problems.

description: Lead the user experience design for key features within the Creative Cloud suite (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator). Conduct user research, create prototypes, and collaborate with product and engineering teams to deliver intuitive interfaces.
responsibilities: Lead the end-to-end design process for new features in Creative Cloud.
Conduct user research, interviews, and usability testing.
Create user flows, wireframes, and high-fidelity prototypes.
Collaborate with PMs and engineers to ensure design quality.
Mentor junior designers and contribute to the design system.
qualities_wanted: Empathy
A deep and genuine understanding of user needs and creative workflows.
Creativity
Delivers intuitive, beautiful, and innovative design solutions.
onboarding_location: Adobe Headquarters, West Tower, San Jose, CA

description: Implement and customize the Salesforce Financial Services Cloud platform for major banking and insurance clients. Requires strong consulting skills, knowledge of Apex, and experience with enterprise-level solution architecture.
responsibilities: Lead client discovery workshops to gather business requirements.
Design and build scalable solutions on the Salesforce platform.
Customize the Financial Services Cloud (FSC) platform to meet client needs.
Manage data migration and integration with other systems.
Train client administrators and end-users.
qualities_wanted: Client-Facing
Excellent communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills.
Problem-Solver
Adept at translating complex business needs into practical, technical solutions.
onboarding_location: Salesforce Tower New York, Bryant Park, New York, NY
